Name: Lighten Up
About the game: Lighten Up is a short-and-sweet puzzle experience. Use your deduction and process of elimination to light up the tiles in each level using all the pieces you're provided. Or throw away logic, enjoy the relaxing vibe, and trail-and-error your way to a level clear! Game length is about 30 minutes, depending on your puzzle-solving skills. Features ✅ Can be played using mouse only ✅ 51 puzzles to solve ✅ Minimalist visuals: the game uses just 4 colors ✅ Soothing background track and sound effects Trailer song: VGMA Challenge - July 20th by Abstraction
